titles.title: Public Housing Funding Flexibility Act of 1994

To amend section 14 of the United States Housing Act of 1937 to authorize public housing agencies to use comprehensive modernization grant amounts to leverage amounts to replace and modernize public housing.

bill.summary: 7/13/1994--Introduced. Public Housing Funding Flexibility Act of 1994 - Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to permit a public housing agency to use grants to leverage amounts which shall be used for financing housing to replace existing public housing dwelling units or for modernization of public housing.
